name: higlass
description: HiGlass Hi-C / genomic / large data viewer
author: Peter Kerpedjiev <pkerpedjiev@gmail.com>

scripts.build: rm -rf build/*; rm -rf dist/*; mkdir -p dist/; webpack --config ./webpack.config.js --mode development; cp build/hglib.js dist/; cp app/index.html dist/; cp build/hglib.css dist/hglib.css;
scripts.build-amd: rm -rf build/*; rm -rf dist/*; mkdir -p dist/; webpack --config ./webpack.config.amd.js --mode development; cp build/hglib-amd.js dist/; cp build/hglib-amd.css dist/hglib-amd.css;
scripts.build-amd-dev: rm -rf build/*; rm -rf dist/*; mkdir -p dist/; webpack --config ./webpack.config.amd.dev.js --mode development; cp build/hglib-amd-dev.js dist/; cp build/hglib-amd-dev.css dist/hglib-amd-dev.css;
scripts.build-watch: rm -rf build/*; rm -rf dist/*; mkdir -p dist/; webpack --config ./webpack.config.js --mode development --watch; cp build/hglib.js dist/; cp app/index.html dist/; cp build/hglib.css dist/hglib.css;
scripts.compile: rm -rf build/*; rm -rf dist/*; mkdir -p dist/; webpack --config ./webpack.config.js --mode production; cp build/hglib.min.js dist/; cp build/hglib.js dist/; cp app/index.html dist/; cp build/hglib.css dist/hglib.css; zip -r dist.zip dist

devDependenciesComments: webpack-dev-server is pinned because later versions did not serve all static directories: https://github.com/higlass/higlass/issues/623
